    public class LoginServlet<T extends AppUser>
extends WebappServlet
    LoginServlet Handles password based logins.

        public static void doLoginResult(AppContext conn,
                                 HttpServletRequest req,
                                 HttpServletResponse res,
                                 FormResult result)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        go to intial page on login. optionally this performs a double redirect through the LoginServlet to test if cookies are supported and suppress url rewriting for the initial page
